message.transactionTemplateRescheduled: The template's next scheduled date has been rescheduled to {{date}}.
message.confirmSetPassword: Are you sure you want to set a password? Once set, you will need to enter the password to continue using the application when starting or after a certain period.
message.confirmClearPassword: Are you sure you want to clear the password? Once cleared, you will be able to use the application without entering a password.
message.passwordSet: The password has been successfully set.
message.passwordCleared: The password has been successfully cleared.

password.passwordHint: Set a password. Once set, the password will be required to continue using the application upon startup.
password.passwordTimeoutHint: Set password timeout. After the timeout, you need to re-enter the password to continue using
password.passwordResetProcedureHint: The process to clear the password requires the current password or a password reset code
password.newHint: The password to be used must be at least one character long
password.againHint: Re-enter the same password to ensure there are no input errors
password.currentHint: The current password must be provided to clear or update the password
password.againMustMatch: The entered password must match the previous one
